machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "告诉我基里尔牧首的最后一次讲话。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "أخبرني عن الخطاب الأخير للبطريرك كيريل."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Cuénteme el último discurso del Patriarca Kirill."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Erzählen Sie mir die letzte Rede von Patriarch Kyrill."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Расскажите мне последнюю речь патриарха Кирилла."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Bana Patrik Kirill'in son konuşmasını anlatın."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Conte-me o último discurso do Patriarca Kirill."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "告訴我族長基里爾的最後演講。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मुझे पितृसत्ता किरिल का आखिरी भाषण बताओ।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "آخرین سخنرانی پدرسالار کریل را به من بگویید."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Vertel my die laaste toespraak van aartsvader Kirill."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ngitshele inkulumo yokugcina yenzalamizi kirill."}]

Entry: I would also be willing to sacrifice myself for Satan! Hail Satan!
